name: label-automate
description: label automater for small businesses. run the node application app.js, This application=> ->tails the log file and reads new changes ->creates an api which sends new date and time as the response. after running the node application open label.html, This webpage=> ->uses qrcode-custom.js to send a GET req to fetch the current date and time and create its qr code using davids qr-code library Use this to tail any file and generate qr-codes when necessary.
